features: Transparent Top Lid for Easy Viewing: Our stovetop espresso maker, or moka pot, features an innovative transparent top lid so you're able to see when your espresso is ready without needing to lift the lid. This helps to avoid unnecessary spills and burns that are common with other espresso makers

Easy Grip Handle Helps Avoid Burns: Our stove top espresso coffee maker's handle is durable and bends away from the hot espresso pot giving your hand and knuckles ample space to avoid burns. The base of the italian coffee maker also features a safety valve that allows excess steam to flow out of the base

Stainless Steel Coffee Clip Spoon Included: Easily scoop your favorite ground beans and then reseal the coffee bag with our convenient coffee clip spoon. Made of 100 percent 304 food grade stainless steel. Included with our moka pot for added convenience

Designed with a High Gloss Protective Finish: Made of high quality food grade aluminum and coated with a mirror finish on both the inside and outside of the moka coffee pot. Our proprietary protective metal coating prevents pitting, rusting and other blemishes that are common with other espresso stovetop makers

Hand Wash Only: To clean your espresso maker, first disassemble and toss out coffee grounds. Please wait until the moka pot is fully cooled before touching. Wash all components by hand only using warm water and dish soap. Do not put in the dishwasher. Dry thoroughly before reassembling coffee maker. IMPORTANT: When using on an induction stove, an adapter or diffuser plate may be necessary as base of the espresso maker may not meet the size requirement of the induction stove

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cafe Du Chateau Espresso Maker Café Du Chateau combines elegance and utility into a beautifully crafted Espresso Maker. With more than 30,000 satisfied buyers, Café du Chateau is your trusted source for brewing like a barista. The Café Du Chateau Espresso Maker takes brewing the perfect cup to the next level. It’s easy to use, clean, and features an innovative transparent lid, easy-grip handle to avoid burns, and a nifty coffee clip spoon. Our stovetop coffee pot delivers convenience, quality, and elegance.

Enjoy Professional Quality Coffee At Home With the Stovetop Espresso Maker Café Du Château Espresso Maker FOOD SAFE PROTECTIVE FINISH Made of high-quality food-grade aluminum and coated with a mirror finish on both the inside and outside of the pot. Our proprietary protective metal coating prevents “pitting”, rusting and other blemishes that are common with other espresso coffee makers. WORKS WITH ALL STOVE TOPS Brews a great pot of coffee in just 5 minutes and works with all stoves including gas, induction, electric, coil, propane camping stoves and more. Note: When using on an induction stove, an adapter or diffuser plate may be necessary as the base of the espresso maker may not meet the size requirement of the induction stove MAKES 6 CUPS Easy to use and delivers 6 cups, 60 ml of full-bodied and aromatic coffee. Simply fill the base with water, fill the filter with coffee grounds and then percolate your coffee until it’s ready to serve. From there, you can drink it straight as a shot or you can make americanos, frappes, lattes, cappuccinos, and much more.

Moka Pot Features Transparent Top Lid Our innovative top lid lets you see when your espresso is ready without ever needing to lift the handle. Helping avoid unnecessary spills and burns. Easy Grip Handle Our durable handle provides you with a firm and reliable grip, and bends away from the hot espresso pot giving your hand and knuckles ample space to avoid burns. Stainless Steel Coffee Clip Easily scoop your favorite ground coffee beans and then reseal the coffee bag with our convenient coffee clip spoon. Made of 100% 304 food-grade stainless steel.

Get Your Italian Coffee Maker Brewing in Minutes Add Water Fill the base with cold filtered water just below the valve. Add Coffee Grounds Fill the filter with freshly ground medium to fine coffee or espresso grinds. Re-insert the filter inside of the base and tightly screw the upper part of the pot to the base. Add Heat Place the espresso maker on a heat source. Enjoy Use caution to safely remove the espresso maker from the heat source. Sip, savor and enjoy an excellent cup of coffee every time.

Espresso Pot Questions & Answers Espresso maker benefits? Our stove top espresso coffee maker allows you to brew your favorite cup of coffee from the comfort of your own home. It features a transparent top lid so you can easily see when your coffee is ready, an easy grip handle that turns away from the moka pot to avoid burns, and a sturdy pit resistant protective metal coating. In addition, it comes with a stainless steel coffee clip spoon to help scoop then seal your coffee grounds. How much coffee does it make? Our Italian espresso maker is large enough to make 6 cups (60ml) of coffee. Simply drink your espresso as a shot or incorporate it into your frappuccinos, cappuccinos, or americanos. How to use the espresso maker? Fill the base with cold water just below the valve. It’s important to not overfill. Fill the filter with your preferred coffee grounds. Reattach the filter to the base and then screw on the top part of the espresso maker to the filter. Place the moka pot onto any type of stove and let it brew for 5 minutes. Works with all stove types? Yes, our cafetera is designed to work with all stoves including gas, induction, electric, coil, propane camping stoves and more. When using on an induction stove, an adapter or diffuser plate may be necessary as the base of the espresso maker may not meet the size requirement of the induction stove. How to clean espresso maker? Let the coffee espresso maker cool down before cleaning. Once cool, disassemble the filter and toss out coffee grounds. Wash all components by hand only. DO NOT put it into the dishwasher. Use warm water and dish soap. Let dry before reassembling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I recommend this product. It makes delicious espresso and very easy to use. The clear top makes it easy to know when your coffee is ready, and allows for no mess. The little scooper was an added bonus, with a clamp to ensure it does not get lost. The instructions that come with the box are very easy to follow, and the coffee maker is super easy to clean. I first used this coffee maker while camping and I was very happy with how easy the process was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the concept of the see through window on the cover but it keeps falling off. Exasperating. Will return.Rest of construction is okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made, practical and stylish
reviews.reviewText: Without doubt the best I’ve tried so far.Easy pour, no spilling. Nice touch with the see-through lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Careful chateau expresso maker
reviews.reviewText: Good quality love this expresso maker

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great look. Great Espresso
reviews.reviewText: I really like this Espresso maker. The capacity is what i've been looking for, my current maker is too small. I like the see through top and the flavor is as good if not better than the coffee store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The lid broke
reviews.reviewText: I really like my expresso maker I give it 2 stars cause on the second day of using it the lid fell off and it won't stay on I didn't return because I had used it already

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received my order very quickly and was excited. When I opened it, I realized that the clear part of the top was plastic instead of glass, I thought about how that couldn't be a good idea but moved on from it. 3 days in using it, the clear plastic part of the lid pops out as soon as you pull on the black knob, and pops out every time, you let the lid drop.Whoever thought it was a good idea to put a plastic top, in a metal container producing a boiling liquid didn't think this one through.I'm disappointed. I'll be ordering something else.

If you are someone who loves a good cup of coffee every morning, this product is good for you. I use it on daily basis and it works great. It has good capacity, pours out two half cups of coffee or one full cup for every single brew. The handle looses out after a couple of use but won’t create any problems.

Funktioniert tadellos auf meinem Induktionsherd. Auf der mobilen Platte, das der Plattendurchmesser zu groß ist, nicht dafür aber zuhause. Wer meint, sich "verkauft" zu haben, kann einen kleinen (mit ein wenig Wasser gefüllten) Kochtopf zusätzlich mit auf die Platte stellen und dann funktioniert auch ein größerer Plattendurchmesser. Fazit: Empfehlenswert!

reviews.reviewTitle: Très bonne cafetière, surtout dessus sa transparence,pour voir si le café est bien monté..merci
reviews.reviewText: J'aime sa forme,sa transparence sur le dessus pour mieux voir si le café est monté,c'est une 14 tasses j'en suis contente,je ne bois mon café que dans ces cafetières italiennes merci.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use on my induction hob and it does work but you need to move it around to get the right spot for it to work. I found that by using a small sturdy frying pan and preheating it on the lowest setting it works really well and does not affect my induction hob. I also found that the best way to use it is to put in hot water in the base and to leave the lid open when using it. Since doing this I have found that it really improves the flavour. The espresso maker is well made and I have had no other issues with it so would definitely recommend it.
